clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for the treatment of acute uncomplicated influenza in patients 18 years and older who have been symptomatic for no more than two days label

incompatibilities.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Rubella virus vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette guerin substrain tice live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette guerin substrain connaught live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Yellow Fever Vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Anthrax vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid Vaccine Live can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette guerin substrain danish 1331 live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Human adenovirus e serotype 4 strain cl 68578 antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Vibrio cholerae CVD 103 HgR strain live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Adenovirus type 7 vaccine live can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
The therapeutic efficacy of Varicella Zoster Vaccine Live attenuated can be decreased when used in combination with Peramivir
